name: Which i like
description:
Hi, nice to see you! 

This is a pixel game which shows what I like briefly! It  expresses something about reading, doing handworks, painting, playing digital gams and imagining in a simple way.

Use keyboard to control:

Type W/A/S/D to move .

Music by Aural Space.

Wish you enjoy it!

And there is a link of its video :

Tips: If you can't play it on web, you can download the its ZIP file.
